headline: Ask HN: Dang – May we please have multiple threads for askjob types?
description:
This thread has evolved multiple times since inception (I was among the early who asked for a "who wants to be hired" thread.)

Now the threads get >500 comments some times...

May we please have a couple categories of threads - not every single engineer on HN (most of them are) not "Rockstar Whatever Hacker Term is loud these days) <-- and there are a ton of project/product manager, SWE, Security, blah blah blah... devops folks....

FLAGS, TAGS, or different threads for these?

I love the simplicity of HN, but does anyone find it kind of odd that for these threads, HN has literally the tech community as its beck and call...

This particular function could evolve.

(I've been on HN for 15+ years... I appreciate a lot of the nostalgic facility, however: change gunna change, and just as adding the whos hiring thread was a tumultuous change that took some course corrects... Its time to put a bit more planning in this.)

I am not a senior SWE. MANY are, and I shield/guide/assist them from a lot of distractions through tech management, and have managed incredible teams.

There are other roles and silos and verticals on HN, May we please branch this thread out a little further?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Dang - 我们能不能为askjob类型设立多个主题？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Dang - 我們能不能為askjob類型設立多個主題？
description_zh-Hans:
这条线自成立以来已经演变了多次（我是早期要求设立"谁想被雇用"线程的人之一。）

现在线程有时会得到>500条评论......

我们能否有几个类别的线程 - 不是HN上的每个工程师（其中大多数是）不是"Rockstar不管黑客术语这些天很吵）<- 还有大量的项目/产品经理，SWE，安全，等等等等。 ...devops folks....

FLAGS, TAGS, 或者不同的线程？

我喜欢HN的简单性，但是有没有人觉得有点奇怪，对于这些线程，HN实际上是把技术社区作为它的召唤...

这个特殊的功能可以发展。

（我已经在HN上呆了15年以上... 我很欣赏很多怀旧的设施，但是：变化是要改变的，就像增加招聘线程是一个动荡的变化，需要一些过程的纠正......

我不是一个资深的SWE。很多人都是，我通过技术管理保护/指导/协助他们免受很多干扰，并管理着令人难以置信的团队。

在HN上还有其他角色、筒仓和垂直领域，我们能不能把这个主题再分支一下？
